Plot: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.
Title: Trance
Writer: Joe Ahearne (screenplay), John Hodge (screenplay), Joe Ahearne (story)
Actors: James McAvoy, Vincent Cassel, Rosario Dawson, Danny Sapani
tomatoConsensus: As stylish as ever, director Danny Boyle seems to be treading water with the surprisingly thinly written Trance -- but for fans of Boyle's work, it should still prove a trippily entertaining distraction.
